text:
Bill Gates says that criticisms of how China lied about the coronavirus is a “distraction”: 

“China did a lot of things right at the beginning … they avoided the incredible economic pain … I think there’s a lot of incorrect and unfair things said.”
https://t.co/H5P3OBn3BF

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Vertical
domain.description: Top level interests and hobbies groupings, like Food or Travel

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain
